description: As the traveler approaches this Loop, a view of the horizon shows sand dunes with what surely must be the white sands of a beach out beyond the dunes.  Has a wrong turn been made?  Actually the traveler is on track to visit one of the most highly specialized habitat types in the Great Plains – the Salt Plans, the heart of this Loop.  The Salt Plains, a geologic wonder, consists of thin deposits of evaporated salt over mud interrupted by channels and pools of shallow water.

name: Great Plains Trail - Salt Plains Loop
